yuppie.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a young person with a professional job who seems to be interested only in earning a lot of money and buying expensive things
yuppie.translation[1].definitions[0].def: a young person in a professional job with a high income, especially one who enjoys spending money and having a fashionable way of life
yuppie.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: The area has been converted into smart flats for yuppies.
